name: SalmonellosisTestsForSalmonellaExceptSTyphiAndSParatyphiByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Salmonellosis (Tests for Salmonella except S. typhi and S. paratyphi by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of salmonella sp and subtypes (excluding typhi-specific culture) and other testing on isolates),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory test name ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: component:salmonella culture or isolate;  

LOINC search: 'Salmonella (culture or isolate) -typhi -egg'),(Exclusion Criteria: Salmonella typhi OR egg as specimen)
